Great looking card.

PM me if interested.

Brad, I plead ignorance on this card as I don't know anything about it nor could I afford it. But by god this is amazing !!!
I agree. Just finally got on at the National. One of my favorite cards and one of the all-time great cards in my opinion. Good luck with sale, Op
